profile.name: Slushi
profile.tagline: Just a programmer doing silly things.
bio: hello! I'm Slushi, or rather Andr√©s, a guy from Latin America üáªüá™, who is still learning to program and improve at it.
I have been a programmer, mainly using Haxe, for the last four years, creating various things and also trying to help anyone I can.
I am currently focused on bringing Haxe to video game consoles in a free form (or homebrew), starting with the Nintendo Wii U and currently with the Nintendo Switch.
But my priority is to deliver projects that I like and that others might like or even find helpful. I just want to do silly things in the world of programming.
